plot: Britten's interest in a tip linked to a case he was investigating before the accident worries Capt. Harper; Hannah prepares for the move.

Britten gives notice, having promised to move with his wife, who accept a job out of state, so the captain tells her cahoots it's no longer necessary to eliminate him. His therapist believes he imagines an unfinished case, officially closed, as an excuse to stay. A corpse hidden in construction concrete years ago is that of Guatemalan immigrant Jose's missing brother, or not quite.—KGF Vissers
